title: 3 MAN DC? GG? WTF
body: so we are playing all pretty well, we are doing really good, looks like and easy game, then boom 3 of my team dcs at once, the enemy team push and end the game. holy fucking shit. i was like finally a win (after this 4 loss streak) anddddd its gone.

replies.body: I've chalked this kind of thing up to the possibility of 3 people using the same connection.
